= How to run HTML Encrypter on Linux. =

== Steps to follow ==

  * Download the latest release from the download section.
  * Unzip the archive anywhere on your computer.
  * Right click on Encrypter.jar and select *Properties*
  * Choose the *Permissions* tab
  * Tick the *Allow executing file as program* checkbox
  * Click *Close* and now you can open the application under Linux

_If the steps above are followed correctly, you should have no problem in running HTML Encrypter. If any problems occur don't hesitate in contacting me [http://www.htmlencrypter.call-to-action.ro/contact here]._

_For HTML Encrypter to work properly on a Linux based machine you need a version of Java between 1.5 and the latest._
